title.rendered: ANZ has joined hands with Smile Foundation

content.rendered:
ANZ has joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide door-step health facilities in slum clusters of Bengaluru. The partnership will result into directly benefitting 11,880 beneficiaries during the span of nine months.

The intervention will make the health care amenities accessible in 23 slums/resettlement colonies of Bengaluru. The vehicle is equipped with a qualified doctor, nurse, lab technician, pharmacist and a driver, to be overall administered by the Project Coordinator. Besides medical consultation, the beneficiaries will also be provided with free of cost medicines and lab testing facilities.

The operations started in January 2016.
